name: A starving monk
description:
"A starving monk" is my first Ludum Dare Entry for LD 43 Jam. You play as a monk that joins a new order. The order doesn't have much money and the master of the order told you to collect as many coins as you can. 

Control the monk during his crazy run. Avoid obstacles like the benches or people who don't want to donate . 
Collect as many coins as you can from people who have money (have a coin above their head).

Controls:
A,S,D - left/right/center
